00023 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Compare;
00024 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00025 
00026 =head1 NAME
00027 
00028 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Compare - Compare problems
00029 
00030 =cut
00031 
00032 use strict;
00033 use warnings;
00034 
00035 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00036 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00037 use WeBWorK::Form;
00038 use WeBWorK::Utils qw(readDirectory max);
00039 use WeBWorK::Utils::Tasks qw(renderProblems);
00040 
00041 require WeBWorK::Utils::ListingDB;
00042 
00043 
00044 
00045 #sub pre_header_initialize {
00046 #    my ($self) = @_;
00047 #    my $r = $self->r;
00048 #}
00049 
00050 sub body {
00051     my ($self) = @_;
00052 
00053     my $r = $self->r;
00054     my $ce = $r->ce;                            # course environment
00055     my $db = $r->db;                            # database
00056     my $j;                                              # garden variety counter
00057 
00058     my $userName = $r->param('user');
00059 
00060     my $user = $db->getUser($userName); # checked
00061     die "record for user $userName (real user) does not exist."
00062         unless defined $user;
00063 
00064     ### Check that this is a professor
00065     my $authz = $r->authz;
00066     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($userName, "modify_problem_sets")) {
00067         print "User $userName returned " .
00068             $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_problem_sets") .
00069             " for permission";
00070         return(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'},
00071           CGI::em("You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")));
00072     }
00073 
00074     my $path1 = $r->param('path1') || '';
00075     my $path2 = $r->param('path2') || '';
00076     if ($r->param('clear')) {
00077         $path1 = '';
00078         $path2 = '';
00079     }
00080     my @pathlist = ();
00081     push @pathlist, $path1 if $path1;
00082     push @pathlist, $path2 if $path2;
00083     my @rendered = renderProblems(r=> $r,
00084                                                                 user => $user,
00085                                                                 problem_list => \@pathlist,
00086                                                                 displayMode => 'images');
00087 
00088     ##########  Extract information computed in pre_header_initialize
00089     print CGI::startform({-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri, -name=>'mainform'}),
00090         $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00091     print CGI::p('File 1: ', CGI::textfield(-name=>"path1",
00092                                                                                     -default=>"$path1",
00093                                                                                     -override=>1, -size=>90));
00094     print CGI::p('File 2: ', CGI::textfield(-name=>"path2",
00095                                                                                     -default=>"$path2",
00096                                                                                     -override=>1, -size=>90));
00097     print CGI::p(CGI::submit(-name=>"show_me",
00098                                                      -value=>"Show Files"));
00099     print CGI::p(CGI::submit(-name=>"clear",
00100                                                      -value=>"Clear"));
00101     print CGI::endform(), "\n";
00102 
00103     for $j (@rendered) {
00104         print '<hr size="5" color="blue" />';
00105         if ($j->{flags}->{error_flag}) {
00106             print CGI::p('Error');
00107         } else {
00108             print $j->{body_text}
00109         }
00110     }
00111     print '<hr size="5" color="blue" />';
00112     if (scalar(@pathlist)>1) {
00113         print CGI::h2('Diff output');
00114         my $use_hdiff = 0;
00115         if($use_hdiff) {
00116             # If you have hdiff installed, you can get colorized diffs
00117             my $diffout = `hdiff -t " " -c "File 1" -C "File 2" -N $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/$pathlist[0] $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/$pathlist[1]`;
00118             print $diffout;
00119         } else { 
00120             # Here we call diff.  Basic version first
00121             my $diffout = `diff -u $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/$pathlist[0] $ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/$pathlist[1]`;
00122             print "\n<pre>\n";
00123             print $diffout;
00124             print "</pre>\n";
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     return "";  
00129 }
